cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 280 mi SSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating north-northeast toward Florida’s Big Bend, then inland across GA/SC and up the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend (between Suwannee River and Mexico Beach)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Anclote River to Suwannee River, and west of Mexico Beach to Destin; Tropical Storm Watch: Marineland FL to South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Suwannee River to Mexico Beach; Tropical Storm Warning: Anclote River to Suwannee River and west of Mexico Beach to Destin
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Big Bend and Panhandle, then Georgia and the Carolinas Atlantic coastline
weather_observation.wind: Occasional squalls with gusts 25–35 mph possible Thursday into early Friday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal rise <1 ft possible along Mobile Bay Thursday night
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain-bands may bring 1–2 in of rain to the Mobile area
weather_observation.other_hazards: Brief marine squalls could create short-lived reduced visibility for vessel traffic
